Description:
1. Recognition is 4 or less: Use bag 1
2: Recognition is 5 or greater: Use bag 2
3: Recognition is 6 or greater: Add 1 random enemy from the Metamorphosis Set (Optional)
4: Add 1 random enemy from the Hunters of Yharnam set
5. recognition is 3 or 4, add one random card from the Agents of Impurity set. if 5 or higher, shuffle two cards.
Name: Notecard
